Now in 600 of the Armenian era red snow came to the country of Jahan in the month of Nawasard,And on the same day when red snow came there, white snow mixed with ashes came in the Christian lands like in the past year.And it was not because of their faith or friendship that they had toward the Christians.which they took easily from the Christians.They would be taken harmlessly by order of Nur ad-Din, which indeed he did in this way, and sultan Masud and Malik his son did likewise out of desire for the lands,Having made an oath of confirmation they willingly gave up their fortress Tell Bashir.who there were Franks or Armenians, would wish to go to Antioch or another place.And the Christians,and because they did not have their alliances from anywhere.When the son of Zengi, who was lord of Aleppo, learned of this, he came with an army against them.Then after all this the army and citizens who were in Tell Bashir were bearing half-patiently the tribulations which were written [about].on the 23rd of the month.
